posts.post_content:
Polar Bear Lot

I had all of these items as interesting supplement to my PB binder. 
Couple of postcards of the PB factory, an interesting card with a funny little poem on the back, and 4 different PB coupons, all from different years. 

Asking $200pp.ff for the lot
